name: Harpy's Axe
description:
Created during a game jam for the indie arcade cabinet The Winnitron (and The HalifaxMachine)

Two players with input meant for the arcade machine (wasd, z, x player 1; ijkl, n, m player2)

features Creative Commons music 'Elum' by Swin Deorin (http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Swin_Deorin/Sect...)

Queued for post-jam version.
